name: Saber crook
description:
Are you ready for some crocodile saber fruit slicing?
Well yes you are! - swipe, slash and hack your way through friuts that pops up on the screen!

Slice them one and twice but stay away from the bombs because if you slice it then you will sleep with the fishes per say.

Awesome and fun gameplay for any age to play, quick launch and tons of fruit slicing action.
